text_block_list.text: Finally, the day of Matikanetannhauser's debut race has arrived!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I've trained this body hard for this day! It's in perfect shape!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It seems my dad and mom are cheering me on from the shop, too—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yes! First, let's go all out, me and my trainer, and smash that first win!
choice_data_list: Yeah, let's give it our all!
Yeah, let's give it our all!

text_block_list.text: Swearing this to each other, we headed to the waiting room with high spirits!
There's still time. Just to be safe, I turned around to review the strategy with her, who was following from behind—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I went into the wrong room. Ahaha!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Man~, when I get all fired up like 'Let's do this!', I tend to mess up somehow.
Full of fighting spirit, but still a bit loose—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Well, let's shake it off and do our best!
And so, the debut race began!
